Name: Blue
UnlockRequirement: Discover at least 20 items from your collection.

Name: Yellow
UnlockRequirement: Discover at least 50 items from your collection.

Name: Green
Effect: At the end of each Round: $2 per remaining Hand, $1 per remaining Discard, Earn no interest.
UnlockRequirement: Discover at least 75 items from your collection.

Name: Black
UnlockRequirement: Discover at least 100 items from your collection.

Name: Magic
Effect: Start run with the Crystal Ball voucher active and two copies of The Fool.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run with Red Deck on any difficulty.

Name: Nebula
Effect: Start run with the Telescope voucher active, -1 consumable slot.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run with Blue Deck on any difficulty.

Name: Ghost
Effect: Spectral cards may appear in the shop, start with a Hex card.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run with Yellow Deck on any difficulty.

Name: Abandoned
Effect: Start run with no Face Cards in your deck.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run with Green Deck on any difficulty.

Name: Checkered
Effect: Start run with 26 Spades and 26 Hearts in deck.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run with Black Deck on any difficulty.

Name: Zodiac
Effect: Start run with Tarot Merchant, Planet Merchant, and Overstock.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Red Stake difficulty.

Name: Painted
UnlockRequirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Green Stake difficulty.

Name: Anaglyph
Effect: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a Double Tag.
UnlockRequirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Black Stake difficulty.

Name: Plasma
Effect: Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand, X2 base Blind size
UnlockRequirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Blue Stake difficulty.

Name: Erratic
Effect: All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized
UnlockRequirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Orange Stake difficulty.

Name: Challenge
UnlockRequirement: Unlocked by default in Challenge mode.
